meanings.definition: A slang term for bathrooms or outhouses.
meanings.sent1: The campsite had simple biffies for the visitors to use.
meanings.sent2: The park ranger pointed out the location of the biffies to the hikers.
meanings.sent3: During the camping trip, Sarah accidentally walked into the biffies meant for the staff.
meanings.sent4: The old biffies in the forest seemed like mysterious cabins hidden among the trees.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the biffies was enough to discourage anyone from going near them.

meanings.definition: A slang term for close friends or companions.
meanings.sent1: My biffies and I always have a great time together at the park.
meanings.sent2: After school, the group of biffies would often hang out at the diner.
meanings.sent3: When Tom called his dog his biffy, everyone found it amusing.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the main character's loyal dog was portrayed as his biffy.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the two siblings was as strong as that of the closest biffies.
